dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So Kazakhstan just jumped up in the Global Innovation Index for 2024—what's behind that sudden rise?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So Kazakhstan just jumped up in the Global Innovation Index for twenty twenty four-what's behind that sudden rise?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Daren Tang noted that Kazakhstan's recent efforts have yielded positive results, as the country improved its position in the Global Innovation Index in 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it's all tied to their partnership with WIPO, the World Intellectual Property Organization. President Tokayev met with Daren Tang to really push their innovation ecosystem forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it's all tied to their partnership with W I P O, the World Intellectual Property Organization. President Tokayev met with Daren Tang to really push their innovation ecosystem forward.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with Daren Tang, Director General of the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO), to discuss the development of Kazakhstan's intellectual property sector, according to a statement from Akorda. During the meeting, the sides discussed joint initiatives aimed at enhancing Kazakhstan's potential in the field of intellectual property, strengthening its innovation ecosystem, and building a sustainable knowledge-based economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're working on a National Innovation Strategy with a big intellectual property component. That seems pretty ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're working on a National Innovation Strategy with a big intellectual property component. That seems pretty ambitious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A project is currently underway to develop a National Innovation Strategy that includes an intellectual property component.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're even setting up Technology and Innovation Support Centers, which is uh, a concrete step toward building that knowledge-based economy they want.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're even setting up Technology and Innovation Support Centers, which is uh, a concrete step toward building that knowledge-based economy they want.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan and WIPO are also working together to launch Technology and Innovation Support Centers," the statement read.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though—WIPO isn't just some niche group. They handle major treaties like the Berne Convention and the Paris Convention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though-W I P O isn't just some niche group. They handle major treaties like the Berne Convention and the Paris Convention.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: WIPO is an international organization that administers several key global treaties in the field of intellectual property, including the Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic Works and the Paris Convention for the Protection of Industrial Property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and they've been a UN agency since 1974, so this is serious institutional backing for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and they've been a U N agency since nineteen seventy four, so this is serious institutional backing for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since 1974, WIPO has also operated as a specialized agency of the United Nations focused on creativity and intellectual property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But you know, Tokayev's been busy—he also met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe and French officials around the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But you know, Tokayev's been busy-he also met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe and French officials around the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 29, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe, Alain Berset. On the sidelines of the Astana International Forum, Tokayev held talks with Laurent Saint-Martin, President of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the French National Assembly, Bruno Fuchs, and executives from EDF, SUEZ, and Sanofi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it feels like Kazakhstan is really positioning itself as a hub for international dialogue and innovation, not just in the region but globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it feels like Kazakhstan is really positioning itself as a hub for international dialogue and innovation, not just in the region but globally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think these partnerships actually translate into real change, or is it mostly symbolic?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think these partnerships actually translate into real change, or is it mostly symbolic?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the improvement in the Innovation Index suggests something's working. They're clearly investing in research and cutting-edge tech.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the improvement in the Innovation Index suggests something's working. They're clearly investing in research and cutting-edge tech.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is aimed at promoting scientific research, advancing cutting-edge technologies, and creating a favorable innovation environment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, but sustaining that momentum is another challenge altogether. It's one thing to climb the ranks one year—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but sustaining that momentum is another challenge altogether. It's one thing to climb the ranks one year-

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: —and another to stay there. But with WIPO's support, they might just have a shot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: -and another to stay there. But with W I P O's support, they might just have a shot.
